text_block_list.text:
Ahh～, sunlight being filtered by the leaves… 
It warms my body right up. This is just the best…
text_block_list.name: Stay Gold

text_block_list.text: It's as though I'm walking through the fields of South America. Hahaha, basking in the sun, even my clothes are absorbing the sunlight…
text_block_list.name: Stay Gold

text_block_list.text: Hm… huh?
text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: This light… it's not disappearing?
I came across Stay Gold, who was restlessly looking over her body.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: Hey, you… can you see it?

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
So you can't see it… 
Maybe only I can see it? 
Could it actually not be sunlight through the leaves?

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
What on Earth is this? 
I'm counting… 1—, 2—, 3—, 4—…

When I asked what was bothering her— 
Apparently there were a lot of tiny lights twirling around her body.
It's not a Genji-botaru firefly or a Hotaria parvula firefly. So if it isn't a light from a firefly…
text_block_list.name: Stay Gold

text_block_list.text: Maybe moth scales or some type of ectoplasm…
text_block_list.name: Stay Gold

text_block_list.text: Whatever could this light be? The colors are diverse, the illumination sways from sparkling to flickering, it's all over the place…
text_block_list.name: Stay Gold

text_block_list.text: Haha, I don't get it. But it sure is interesting! I want to uncover the truth behind this…
text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
choice_data_list: How about consulting an expert on ghosts?
I think you can swat it down with your tail.

text_block_list.text:
An expert on ghosts? I see. 
When it comes to that… there's only one place.
text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
Buddhist Monk
text_block_list.text: T-this light is…

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
Oh my, so you can see it. As expected from the head monk. 
Well, do you know what it is?

text_block_list.name: Buddhist Monk
text_block_list.text:
I do not. 
But, this is…
It might be something akin to a "fragmented thought". I feel a faint spiritual energy behind them…
text_block_list.name: Buddhist Monk
Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
A spiritual energy, huh. 
I see, it could very well be…

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: Nothing to that extent, but if this originates from someone's spirit…

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: There's probably someone who wants this back. Someone, somewhere on this planet.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
Swat it with my… tail? 
Alright, just gotta do it just like I'm swatting bugs when I'm camping!

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: Hah! Take this!

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
Oh my, it's still not vanishing… 
I'm certain I hit them too.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
Well then, this has to be 
something spiritual then.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: And if it's something spiritual, that means there's probably someone out there that needs this back. Well, I'll take my time looking into it.

title: To be clad in "Sunlight" filtered by the trees.
